information.name: fio_cz
information.description: This plugin enables you to import payments from Fio bank to UCRM. See https://www.fio.cz/bankovni-sluzby/api-bankovnictvi
information.author: Ubiquiti Networks, Inc.

configuration.label: Fio token
configuration.description: Token obtained from Fio bank internet banking.

configuration.label: Payments start date
configuration.description: Payments older than this date will be ignored.Use d.m.Y format

configuration.label: Match attribute from payment variable symbol to UCRM
configuration.description: Can be 'invoiceNumber', 'clientId', 'clientUserIdent' or a custom attribute key.

configuration.label: Import all payments. (0|1)
configuration.description: Import all payments. Payments without match will be imported as "Unattached payments". Fill 1 to enable or 0 to disable this feature.
